title: Zoe! Should be an SG!

replies.body: that looks like something someone made to fulfill their lolita fantasies.
I know I know, but still, best one I could find and it's there for reference.

supposed leak she was getting one, dont know about its authenticity, but could go something like a jannaesque appeal by poutie

https://orig00.deviantart.net/a0cc/f/2017/352/2/c/sgzoe_by_poutie-dbx507v.png
That's awesome! I did a cheeky ask awhile back, but then was told to make a board and kept forgetting xD
Oh. I read SG as Spirit Guard like Udyr. I guess Star Guardian is cute too.
